Using Chipotle as an Example

I used locations around Minneapolis and the southwest suburbs. So, for example, Edina, Plymouth, Eden Prarie, etc. would be good for testing the functionality. You can use just the city as the address - ex: Edina, MN. For name search testing you can also use a city (Minneapolis, Eden Prarie, etc.) since that is how the location names are set up with this sample data set.
